name: Workin the Graveyard Shift
description:
At the roadside MoonLight Motel, on a dark and stormy night, a young college student is working the graveyard shift and the news reports that a homicidal maniac has escaped from the state hospital. If that wasn't scary enough, the maniac has just walked in through the front doors. 

Choose what you do wisely or else.

Spacebar to go though text. 

Backspace to return to title screen (Only when you get an ending).
